caseStudies.title: E-commerce Store - 340% Traffic Growth
caseStudies.preview: An online fashion retailer struggling with organic visibility achieved remarkable growth through our comprehensive SEO strategy.
caseStudies.challenge: The client was struggling with low organic traffic and poor search visibility in a highly competitive e-commerce market.
caseStudies.solution: We implemented a comprehensive SEO strategy including technical optimization, content creation, and strategic link building.
caseStudies.testimonial: Apis Digitech transformed our online presence completely. The results exceeded our expectations.

caseStudies.title: Local Service Business - 15+ Page 1 Keywords
caseStudies.preview: A local plumbing company went from zero online presence to dominating local search results in their service area.
caseStudies.challenge: The plumbing company had no online presence and was losing customers to competitors with strong local SEO.
caseStudies.solution: We focused on local SEO optimization including Google Business Profile, local citations, and location-based content.
caseStudies.testimonial: We went from invisible to being the top choice in our area. Incredible transformation.

caseStudies.title: SaaS Company - 25+ DA Increase
caseStudies.preview: A B2B SaaS startup transformed their domain authority and organic lead generation through strategic link building.
caseStudies.challenge: The SaaS company had low domain authority and struggled to compete with established players in their niche.
caseStudies.solution: We developed a strategic link building campaign combined with thought leadership content and digital PR.
caseStudies.testimonial: The authority and credibility we've built has transformed our business. Best investment we made.
